Sentencas: In order to establish a new platform to manufacture micro-sized solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with low operating temperatures, new design concepts, new preparation methods and new materials are being explored.
Titulo: On the growth of gadolinia-doped ceria by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: Our studies in this paper are focused on the electrolyte material, and in particular gadolinia doped ceria (GDC), an electrolyte material, likely to replace the traditional yttria-stabilised zirconia (YSZ) for low temperature applications.
Titulo: On the growth of gadolinia-doped ceria by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: GDC films were grown on a single crystal Si by pulsed laser deposition (PLD).
Titulo: On the growth of gadolinia-doped ceria by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: The microstructure of the films as a function of growth time has been studied.
Titulo: On the growth of gadolinia-doped ceria by pulsed laser deposition

Sentencas: We have found that the mean grain size increases with film thickness h as h(2/5), in agreement with theoretical results.
Titulo: On the growth of gadolinia-doped ceria by pulsed laser deposition
